nodes.text: The IR-68 Precision Combat Droid was a model of bipedal battle droid used by the the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War.

IR-68 Precision Combat Droids appear as enemies in the missions "Dark Design" and "All the Pieces," which are the Republic and Imperial versions of a mission in the macrobinoculars mission in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
